item.title: 信实集团获美国通用许可证 可直接购买委内瑞拉原油
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度私营炼油商信实工业有限公司已获得美国颁发的通用许可证，这将允许该公司直接购买委内瑞拉石油。【原文：Indian private refiner Reliance Industries Ltd. has received a general license from the United States that will allow it to purchase Venezuelan oil directly, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 零散股：亚当·波森为何认为通胀将达4%（播客）
item.description: 未来总是难以预测，但关于通胀的讨论，通常聚焦于美联储需要多长时间才能将通胀率拉回2%的目标区间。换言之，人们普遍认同通胀方向，却对速度存在分歧。 但本期嘉宾却与主流观点激烈相左。彼得森国际经济研究所所长亚当·波森认为，通胀率将在年底回升至4%。他首次在与他人合著的文章中提出这一论点——【原文：The future is always tough to predict, but generally when it comes to inflation, a lot of the debate is about how long it will take the Federal Reserve to get back to its 2% target. In other words, people generally agree on the direction, but disagree on the speed. But our guest on this episode violently disagrees with the consensus direction. Peterson Institute President Adam Posen thinks inflation will be back at 4% by the end of the year. He first unveiled his thesis in a piece co-written wit】

item.title: 经济学家预测南非将再降息三次，对降息时机存在分歧
item.description: 一项调查显示，南非储备银行在结束当前宽松周期前，可能还将再降息三次。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank will likely cut interest rates three more times before ending its current easing cycle, according to a survey.】

item.title: 中国AI应用智普计划在上海上市，此前在香港股价飙升320%
item.description: 中国人工智能模型开发商智普科技计划在上海进行二次上市，此前该公司刚在香港完成5.58亿美元的首次公开募股。此举表明市场对国内生成式人工智能热潮仍具发展潜力的信心。【原文：Chinese artificial-intelligence model developer Zhipu is planning a second listing in Shanghai following its recent $558 million initial public offering in Hong Kong, a sign of confidence that the country’s generative-AI rally still has legs.】

item.title: 印度石油部长普里因爱泼斯坦邮件事件面临辞职呼声
item.description: 印度主要反对党国民大会党要求该国石油部长辞职，因其被指与已定罪的性犯罪者杰弗里·爱泼斯坦存在关联。【原文：The Indian National Congress, the country’s main opposition group, called for the resignation of the country’s oil minister because of his alleged links to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.】

item.title: 印尼因涉嫌非法进口查封蒂芙尼门店
item.description: 印度尼西亚因涉嫌违反进口规定，已封锁雅加达的三家蒂芙尼专卖店。此举是总统普拉博沃·苏比安托政府下，针对未申报高价值商品展开的更大规模打击行动的一部分。【原文：Indonesia has sealed three Tiffany & Co. stores in Jakarta on suspicion of import violations, part of a broader crackdown on undeclared high-value goods under the administration of President Prabowo Subianto.】

item.title: 希思罗机场首席执行官仍对第三跑道项目持怀疑态度
item.description: 伦敦希思罗机场负责人对耗资十亿美元的第三跑道建设项目能否推进表示怀疑，称今年规划工作的复杂性可能阻碍项目进展。【原文：The head of London Heathrow Airport expressed doubt about whether a billion-dollar project to build a third runway will go ahead, saying planning complexities this year could hinder progress.】

item.title: 英格兰银行考虑聘请外部机构协助收集私人市场压力数据
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募市场中的一些主要参与者正与英国央行进行磋商，拟委托第三方机构为其开创性的行业压力测试收集数据，以确保该项目能按严格的时间表推进。【原文：Some of the biggest players in private markets are in talks with the Bank of England about using a third party firm to gather data for its ground-breaking industry stress test so that the project can meet demanding timetables, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着贸易规模扩大，更多暗色油轮抵达印度拆船厂
item.description: 不到一个月内，三艘遭美国制裁的油轮已抵达印度西海岸等待拆解。对于正努力接纳更多问题船舶以应对行业低迷的拆船业而言，今年开局异常强劲。【原文：Three US-sanctioned tankers have arrived for demolition on India’s west coast in under a month, an unusually strong start to the year for a ship-breaking trade that is increasing its acceptance of dark vessels in order to counter a painful downturn.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦铁路运营商考虑最早于五月进行10亿美元IPO
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中亚国家哈萨克斯坦唯一的铁路运营商——哈萨克斯坦铁路公司正考虑最早于5月进行首次公开募股，筹集约10亿美元资金，作为其大规模扩张计划的一部分。【原文：Kazakhstan Temir Zholy, the Central Asian country’s sole railway operator, is considering an initial public offering as soon as May to raise about $1 billion as part of its broad expansion drive, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率保持正增长，瑞士央行获得有限缓解
item.description: 1月份瑞士通胀率维持在零上方，这使瑞士国家银行暂时得以喘息，暂时缓解了重启负利率政策的压力。【原文：Swiss inflation stayed just above zero in January, offering limited respite to the Swiss National Bank from pressure to reintroduce negative interest rates.】

item.title: 非洲初创企业债务融资翻倍，股权投资却在萎缩
item.description: 2025年，非洲初创企业的债务融资额几乎翻了一番，而来自风险投资公司的股权融资却有所下降。【原文：African startups almost doubled their debt fundraising in 2025, even as equity financing from venture capital firms declined.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易团队正努力缩小金属关税范围
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，特朗普政府正致力于缩小其对钢铁和铝制品的广泛关税范围。企业认为这些关税难以计算，欧盟也希望将其作为与美国正在谈判的贸易协议的一部分加以限制。【原文：The Trump administration is working to narrow its broad tariffs on steel and aluminum products that companies find difficult to calculate and the European Union wants reined in as part of its pending trade deal with the US, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行尚未看到欧元升值的全部影响，卡扎克斯表示
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员马丁斯·卡扎克斯表示，该行仍在观望欧元自2025年开始的升值将对经济造成多大程度的冲击。【原文：The European Central Bank is still waiting to see how severely the economy will be affected by the ascent of the euro that started in 2025, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 据称InsuranceDekho所有者计划在印度进行2.5亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，运营保险科技初创企业InsuranceDekho的吉尔纳尔保险经纪私人有限公司正考虑在孟买进行首次公开募股，预计融资额最高可达2.5亿美元。【原文：Girnar Insurance Brokers Pvt., which operates insurance tech startup InsuranceDekho, is weighing an initial public offering in Mumbai that could raise as much as $250 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港交易所考虑扩大保密IPO申报范围以促进上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，香港正考虑一项计划，允许更多类型的公司以保密方式申请首次公开募股，以巩固其在全球上市地的领先地位。【原文：Hong Kong is considering a plan to allow a broader range of companies to file for initial public offerings confidentially, according to people familiar with the matter, as the city seeks to cement its lead among global listing venues.】

item.title: 富时100指数期货小幅走高，英镑下跌
台湾考虑对保险公司主权债券持仓征收资本费用
item.description: 据知情人士透露，台湾金融监管机构正考虑要求人寿保险公司针对持有某些评级较低的政府债券增加资本准备金。此举是当局为加强对该行业7000亿美元海外投资组合风险管控而采取的措施。【原文：Taiwan’s financial regulator is considering requiring life insurers to hold additional capital against certain lower-rated government bond holdings as authorities move to tighten risk controls over the industry’s $700 billion overseas portfolio, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 挪威主权财富基金因交易罚款解雇土耳其基金经理
item.description: 挪威央行投资管理公司——该国规模达2.1万亿美元的主权财富基金——在监管机构对该公司一名高管处以不当交易罚款后，终止了与土耳其某金融公司的合作关系。【原文：Norges Bank Investment Management, Norway’s $2.1 trillion sovereign wealth fund, cut ties with a finance firm in Turkey after regulators fined one of its top managers for improper trading.】

item.title: 凯捷咨询公司表示，人工智能转型与主权推动将驱动增长
item.description: 凯捷首席执行官艾曼·埃扎特表示，这家法国IT公司正"明确转向"以促进人工智能的采用，这将推动今年的销售额增长。【原文：Capgemini Chief Executive Officer Aiman Ezzat said the French IT company is “clearly pivoting” to facilitate artificial intelligence adoption, which will fuel sales this year.】

item.title: 日本央行鹰派成员田村宣称春季或为加息时机
item.description: 日本央行最鹰派的成员之一暗示，央行下次加息的条件可能在春季前具备，这一表态可能进一步助长市场对提前加息的猜测。【原文：One of the Bank of Japan’s most hawkish members indicated that conditions for the central bank’s next interest rate hike could be in place by spring, a comment that is likely to fuel further speculation of an early move.】

item.title: 斯图加特证券交易所将加密货币业务部门与交易公司Tradias合并
item.description: 德国斯图加特证券交易所集团（Boerse Stuttgart Group）即将将其加密货币业务与法兰克福数字资产交易商Tradias合并。【原文：German stock exchange operator Boerse Stuttgart Group is set to merge its crypto operations with Frankfurt-based digital asset trader Tradias.】

item.title: 加密货币的自由意志主义梦想助推暗网金钱机器运转
item.description: 一月初，黑客从一个加密货币钱包中盗取了逾2亿美元资金，并将部分赃款兑换成门罗币——这种数字代币的设计初衷就是几乎无法追踪。对门罗币最忠实的拥趸而言，这恰恰证明了该系统的运作完全符合设计初衷。【原文：In early January, hackers drained over $200 million from a crypto wallet and swapped some of the loot into Monero, a type of digital token designed to be near-impossible to trace. To Monero’s most devoted fans, it was a sign that things were working just the way they should.】

item.title: 中国在安全推动中瞄准屏幕密集的汽车仪表盘
item.description: 中国正瞄准特斯拉和小米等企业推崇的极简化、屏幕主导的汽车内饰设计，要求关键安全功能必须通过实体开关或按钮控制。【原文：China is taking aim at stripped-down, screen-dominated car interiors favored by the likes of Tesla Inc. and Xiaomi Corp., requiring that essential safety functions be controlled by physical switches or buttons.】

item.title: 马来西亚内阁下令调查反贪污专员阿扎姆
item.description: 马来西亚内阁已下令对反贪污委员会主席阿扎姆·巴基的指控展开调查。此前有报道称，其持股比例超出公职人员允许的上限。【原文：Malaysia’s cabinet has ordered an investigation into the allegations surrounding anti-graft chief Azam Baki, days after a report said he had shareholdings that were higher than allowed limits for public officials.】

item.title: 雀巢跑步24小时，力争避免配方奶粉短缺危机
item.description: 雀巢公司正加紧生产婴儿配方奶粉以避免短缺，此前一场污染危机导致这家瑞士食品制造商及其竞争对手达能集团和乐天集团召回数百批次产品。【原文：Nestlé SA is ramping up production of infant formula to avert a shortage, after a contamination crisis led the Swiss foodmaker and rival producers Danone SA and Groupe Lactalis to recall hundreds of batches.】

item.title: 如何偷一架飞机？一次偷一块
item.description:
为降低中国对西方航空技术的依赖，北京方面派遣间谍多年潜伏，收集该行业的技术机密。

【原文：

Looking to reduce China’s reliance on Western aviation technologies, Beijing had spies spend years accumulating knowledge about the industry’s secrets.

】

item.title: 世界银行行长班加表示，在动荡时期，多边主义仍能发挥作用
item.description: 世界银行行长阿贾伊·班加在全球倡议和国际组织面临考验之际，为多边主义进行了辩护。【原文：World Bank President Ajay Banga defended multilateralism at a time when global initiatives and international organizations are being tested.】

item.title: 随着波兰企业走向全球，PKO银行计划拓展海外业务
item.description: 波兰最大贷款机构波兰国家银行计划将其欧洲分行网络规模扩大一倍，以配合本土企业跨国扩张的步伐。【原文：Poland’s largest lender PKO Bank Polski SA plans to double its European branch network to keep up with local companies expanding beyond their home market.】
